member.name: T:bf.api.auth.User
member.summary: Authentication controller

member.name: M:bf.api.auth.User.JWTLogin(bf.api.Helpers.AuthObject)
member.summary: Common method to authenticate the mock JWT user
member.returns: This will return the status result after processing the given data set. Always look for standard HTTP reponse codes and expected results are 200, 204, 400, 404, 422 In the event of internal errors, refer IsSuccess boolean property and errors will be available with ErrorMessage property
